name: oidc-implicit-sample
description: Simple Javascript client that implements the OpenID Connect implicit flow

scripts.build: cp node_modules/@ping-identity/p14c-js-sdk-auth/dist/browser/@ping-identity/p14c-js-sdk-auth.js p14c-js-sdk-auth.js && cp node_modules/@shoelace-style/shoelace/dist/shoelace.js shoelace.js && cp node_modules/@shoelace-style/shoelace/dist/themes/light.css light.css
